findNextWeekFirstBlock(uint256).details: find the next week first block of this block. |--------------------------|      |--------------------------| 10                         20     21                         30                       |--18 the next week first block of block#18 is block#20

params._block: the block number to find the next week first block

findWeekByBlockNumber(uint256).details: find the week of that block (week0 starts from the startBlock + 1)

params._block: the block number to find week

getReleaseAmount(uint256,uint256).details: get the amount of distributed token from _fromBlock + 1 to _toBlock

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setTokenPerBlock(uint256,uint256).details: set the amount of token to distribute per block of that week

params._amount: the amount of alpha token to distribute on that week

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

userdoc.notice: Implements the distribution of the Alpha token pool.
